favouriteThemes.pinnedThemes.description: Themes added here will stay pinned at the top of the theme picker

favouriteThemes.themeTypeSortOrder.description: Sort order for pinned and non-pinned themes

favouriteThemes.sortPinnedByRecentUsage.description: If set to `true`, pinned themes will be sorted by their most recent usage. If unset or set to `false`, sorting will fall back to respecting `favouriteThemes.darkThemesFirst` and alphanumerical sort.

favouriteThemes.showExtraQuickPickDetail.description: If set to `true`, the picker will show extra theme details

favouriteThemes.showThemesOfCurrentTypeF.description: If set to `true`, it will override `"favouriteThemes.themeTypeSortOrder"` and it will show at the top themes of the type of the theme that's currently used

favouriteThemes.darkThemesFirst.description: If set to `true`, dark themes will come before light ones - both in the pinned and in the non-pinned section.

favouriteThemes.themeSelectionDelay.description: Delay (in milliseconds) between selecting a theme in the picker and actually applying it. Helps prevent lag when quickly going through themes.

favouriteThemes.updatePreferredThemes.description: Update `workbench.preferredDarkColorTheme` and `workbench.preferredLightColorTheme` when selecting themes through this extension.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
